title: Effects of the spray-drying process using maltodextrin on bioactive compounds and antioxidant activity of the pulp of the tropical fruit açai (Euterpe oleracea Mart.)
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Valentina Vargas, Sebastian Saldarriaga, Francis S. Sánchez, Liceth N. Cuellar, Gloria M. Paladines
